notes.text: We now ensure that fields with a currency or units of measure in a table are correctly aligned along the decimal separator
We’ve resolved an issue where skipping the decimal validation using the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation was omitted due to the automatic rounding of the field values
We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
You can now use the applyState and retrieveState APIs to store and retrieve states of custom sections and subsections
We now provide an option to aggregate data based on the visible table columns in analytical list page applications
We've improved the documentation for the invokeAction method
We no longer show a form container if all its contents are hidden
We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
We've resolved an issue that occurred with fields containing navigation properties in a containment scenario
Navigation properties that are applicable to line items and annotated with TextArrangement as TextOnly are now available for filtering in tables
Copying an entity using the DataFieldForAction annotation now works correctly
Visibility settings of menus are now applied correctly when menu items have their own visibility settings defined
We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the context menu of tables
We now ensure that the action parameter dialog stays open when the user cancels a 412 warning message
Sorting by currency or unit of measure properties that reference texts now works correctly
You can now set the rowCountMode property to 'Interactive' for grid tables in the manifest.json file
We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when discarding the changes made to a non-draft object
We now show the strict handling dialog when an action returns a single warning message with a description or descriptionUrl
We now display all the decimal places for quantities with measures in display mode, with an option to limit the decimal places based on the unit of measure
The appState of the list report is now correctly updated if there are multiple updateAppState calls
